{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

This is a practice library containing a function that helps find numbers in a text file and gives back the sum.

Install

pip install numbers_in_text

How to use

Here is an example:

{% raw %} 
File = open("regex_sum_928284.txt", 'r')
text = File.read()
File.close()
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
number_sum(text)

The total is: 390829
{% endraw %}
